p.k: Sir Simon Rattle conducts the Berlin Philharmonic in the 2016 edition of the Europakonzert, in R?ros, Norway. On the program are Grieg's Lyrical Piece, Op. 68, No. 4, Mendelssohn's Violin Concerto with soloist Vilde Frang and Beethoven's Symphony No. 3.
p.d: Sir Simon Rattle conducts the Berlin Philharmonic in the 2016 edition of the Europakonzert. This time, it takes place at the beautiful Baroque church of R?ros, a Norwegian mining town whose intact picturesque old town makes it a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The talented Norwegian violinist Vilde Frang is the star soloist in Mendelssohn's songful Violin Concerto, Op. 64, which she plays with warmth, elegance and effortless virtuosity.
